title: [GAMEPLAY] Runes problem , I buy runes and it's duplicated !!!
body:
hi to all admins ,,,
i store my influence point (IP) till i get lvl 30 
i had 19417 IP
i buy runes
9*Greater Mark of Attack Damage
+9*Greater Glyph of Magic Resist
+9*Greater Seal of Armor 
+3*Greater Quintessence of Attack Damage
the cost = 8610 IP
the rest should be 19417-8610 = 10807 , i found them 7117 IP
in Purchases list it seems that i buy Greater Mark of Attack Damage and Greater Glyph of Magic Resist  twice in same time 
i do have only 9 of each i mentioned before and not 18 and in the system i can't buy more than 9 and those item are not refundable , i tried to close the game and open it several times . and play a game nothing change
so i need to get my ip back
thanks

attached 2 pic fro the error

replies.body: Can you please open a support ticket, they can help you investigate why you are seeing this and refund the correct amount of IP if there is an issue.

i already send a ticket but my old game friend say that he was hacked then send a ticket they respond him 2 months later . any idea what they will do in my case ???
can i send a mail to them ?

they'll probably eat all his refund tokens though.

they're cool like that.

If you log out and log back in, does it still show the wrong value?

This happened to me once when buying a skin (or maybe a champion, I dunno).  It charged me twice for my purchase.  When I logged out and logged back in, my account showed the proper number of points -- in reality it charged me once, but it looked like it had charged me twice until I relogged.

If you're sure you're missing IP, explain what happened in a support ticket here: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new
(If you register an account over there, then you can track your ticket)

i tried to close the game and open it several times . and play a game nothing change 
now i continue playing and my ip increase after the last 7k not over 10k

from main page ( store ) , scroll down under runes ( to the end )  you will find purchase 

another question is there any admin here who could help or i just put the topic and normal players with high game experience will answer me ?
Good catch,  glad you were paying attention! Maybe submit a support ticket? Where do you check your purchase history,  I should check mine tonight then!
